org.magelan.drawing.geom
Interface GeometryFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractGeometryFactory, DrawingElementFactory, FlyweightShapeFactory, ShapeFactory
public interface GeometryFactory

A factory for drawing elements. The interface defines a set of the simplest possible methods for creation of geometry elements. All other characteristics of the resulting geometry elements may be set using the setValue(Object, String, Object) method and queried using the getValue(Object, String) method. In order to be functional a factory must allow setting of at least color, stroke, paint, font and alpha composite to the elements.

Version:
1.0, 04/2004
Author:
Assen Antov

createText

java.lang.Object createText(double x,
                            double y,
                            java.lang.String text,
                            java.awt.Font font)
Creates a text element. The font parameter may be null and even if available the method may discard it and use a text style, if available.

Parameters:
x - coordinate
y - coordinate
text - text to set
font - the font to use for geometry generation
